AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: veteran narcotics investigator with 17 years of experience, testified to observations about the truck and scissor lift, witnessed two near-collisions, and contacted a patrol deputy for a traffic stop, gathered information from Saldana during the stop, strongly encouraged Saldana to cooperate regarding potential drug trafficking, conducted search and interviewed Saldana, received consent from Saldana to search the truck and trailer, testified about Saldana's driving, individual being questioned, had suspicions regarding potential drug trafficking
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: defendant in a case involving a motion to suppress, truck driver, has a history of arrests including smuggling of illegal aliens and drugs, exhibited signs of nervousness during questioning, served 9 years in federal prison, completed probation 3 years prior, drove the truck and trailer to a tire shop, gave consent to search the truck and trailer, was placed under arrest, moved to suppress cocaine under his rights, individual disputing the basis for the traffic stop, driver of the vehicle and trailer, made troubling statements during questioning
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Daniel Martin Huerta: registered owner of the trailer, person who hired Saldana to drive the scissor lift to Dallas for repairs, owner of the truck and trailer according to Saldana's statements
